channel.title: [317] Clickable button opens link? [Rep++]
channel.description:
[b]Base:[/b] 317 DELTA
I want to make it so when a player clicks one of there highlighted buttons it opens up a new tab in your web browser on the web client.
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2i7mkhh.png[/img]
The window is a custom interface so I think I would have to add a code into my clickingMost.java file, but i'm not sure what the code would be to open a new tab in an internet browser.
If anyone could help me with this issue, that would be great.
Rep++!

item.title: [317] Clickable button opens link? [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

it has something to do with new url(
i believe O_o’
you could google “java open url in web browser”
and as far as the button goes, you can just use the code from other ones…
